ComicInfo.Summary:
You can’t die twice… unless you’re “Here.” Sam’s about to find that out the hard way, as his double-cross is discovered by Mr. Jones and his right hand man Charnel, a serial killer in a past life who has found renewed vigor and purpose in the dark city.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Chris Visions | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Ron Wimberly | 2 |
